creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: five large black characters; two smaller characters at left; five red seals at left edge
dimension:
65 7/8 x 15 15/16 in. (167.32 x 40.48 cm) (image)
76 1/8 x 18 1/2 in. (193.36 x 46.99 cm) (overall, without roller)
text:
The couplet reads from right to left:

A lonely tree takes shelter in the untamed mist,
Around a stack of mountain rocks, the spontaneous cloud idles.
title: Calligraphic hanging scroll, one of a pair
